changeSet.author: psi
changeSet.comment: Adding New Concepts for Referrals Template

changeSet.author: psi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name ='Referrals Template' AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'All Observation Templates');

changeSet.comment: Adding set member Referrals Template to all observation templates

changeSet.author: psi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( 'BAMBANANI', 'MAC', 'GWERU', 'NKULUMANE', 'CHITUNGWIZA', 'NAH', 'CHIPINGE', 'MUTARE', 'CONCESSION', 'CHIREDZI', 'TRIANGLE', 'MASVINGO' ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Referrals Form, Facility");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Referrals Form Question

changeSet.author: psi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( 'BEITBRIDGE', 'BIKITA', 'BINDURA', 'BINGA', 'BUBI', 'BUHERA', 'BULAWAYO', 'BULILIMA', 'CENTENARY', 'CHEGUTU', 'CHIKOMBA', 'CHIMANIMANI', 'CHIPINGE', 'CHIREDZI', 'CHIRUMHANZU', 'CHIVI', 'GOKWE NORTH', 'GOKWE SOUTH', 'GOROMONZI', 'GURUVE', 'GUTU', 'GWANDA', 'GWERU', 'HARARE', 'HURUNGWE', 'HWANGE', 'HWEDZA', 'INSIZA', 'KADOMA', 'KARIBA', 'KWEKWE', 'LUPANE', 'MAKONDE', 'MAKONI', 'MANGWE', 'MARONDERA', 'MASVINGO', 'MATOBO', 'MAZOWE', 'MBERENGWA', 'MBIRE', 'MT.DARWIN', 'MUDZI', 'MUREWA', 'MUTARE', 'MUTASA', 'MUTOKO', 'MWENEZI', 'NKAYI', 'NYANGA', 'OUT', 'RUSHINGA', 'SEKE', 'SHAMVA', 'SHURUGWI', 'TSHOLOTSHO', 'U.B.H.', 'U.M.P', 'UMGUZA', 'UMZINGWANE', 'ZAKA', 'ZVIMBA', 'ZVISHAVANE' ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Referrals Form, District");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Referrals Form Question

changeSet.author: psi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Static','Outreach') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Referrals Form, Site Type");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Referrals Form Question

changeSet.author: psi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Urban','Rural') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Referrals Form, Setting");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Referrals Form Question

changeSet.author: psi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( "Referrals Form, Facility", "Referrals Form, Site Type", "Referrals Form, District", "Referrals Form, Setting" ) AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Referrals Form, Service Provided");

changeSet.comment: Adding set members to Referrals Form
